price: Ẹni tó mú ọlọ́hun mìíràn mọ́ Allāhu, ẹ jù ú sínú ìyà líle.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fa-alqiyāhu fī al-ʿadhābi al-shadīdi
